products.name: Pearl White Bel Buti Patterned Jacket
products.description: With gilded bel buti patterns, this pearl white Nehru jacket showcases the elegance of Jacquard weave. The design is complemented by a welted pocket and ornate buttons, adding a touch of traditional sophistication. Ideal for formal occasions and weddings, this jacket can be paired with pastel hued kurta sets and matching pearl white jutis for a refined and ceremonial look.

products.name: Cream Bel Buti Patterned Sherwani set
products.description: This cream sherwani set features exquisite bel buti pattern embroidery, adorned with rhinestone work for a touch of glamour. The set includes an embroidered bandhgala collar, embellished golden ornate buttons, making it a complete ceremonial attire. For a regal wedding look, pair this sherwani with ivory mojaris and a traditional safa in a matching shade. Accessorize with a pearl necklace to highlight the rhinestone work and add an extra layer of elegance to your outfit.

products.name: Grape Wine Jaal Embroidered Sherwani Set with Stone Work
products.description: Make a regal statement with this grape wine sherwani set, intricately embroidered with a rich jaal pattern and adorned with shimmering stone work. The deep, luxurious hue exudes elegance, while the structured silhouette adds a bold, contemporary edge. Perfect for weddings and grand celebrations, this sherwani blends tradition with sophistication. Pair it with embroidered juttis for a power-packed look that redefines grace with confidence.

products.name: Beige Cream Patterned Sherwani Set
products.description: This Golden Cream sherwani set features a regal Fleur De Lis pattern is the perfect wedding outfit for a subtle royal wedding. The set is further enhanced with a mandarin collar, a welted breast pocket and self embroidered buttons, the sherwani is enriched with metallic golden embroidery all over. This sherwani is complete with a matching pajama and dupatta. Accessorise the outfit with soft golden jutis, a metallic bracelet and a contrasting stone studded mala for a polished look that is effortlessly royal.

products.name: Antique White Floral Patterned Sequined Sherwani Set
products.description: Offering an opulent choice for special occasions, this antique white sherwani set dazzles with its floral embroidery and sequin work. The beaded bandhgala collar and buttons add a touch of sophistication. Perfectly paired with polished loafer shoes and traditional accessories for a regal look.

products.name: Cream Georgette Sherwani
products.description: Crafted from luxurious Georgette fabric, this sherwani emanates a timeless cream hue. A perfect ensemble for the fashion-forward men, it exudes charm and elegance. Comes with complementary pajama and pocket square. Perfect for your unforgettable celebrations.

products.name: Snazzy Dark Blue Cotton Nehru Jacket
products.description: Make a stunning appearance with this snazzy dark blue Nehru Jacket. Crafted from premium cotton, it speaks volumes of elegance and sophistication. Perfect for your next big event, it adds a striking touch to your ensemble. Comes with a pocket pin for added style.

products.name: Rose Pink Bel Buti Patterned Jacket
products.description: This Nehru jacket in rose pink is a work of art, featuring imperial floral patterns in a brocade weave, beautifully highlighted with stone work. The design includes an intricately embroidered bandhgala collar, a welted pocket, and an ornate buttoned placket. Perfect for celebratory occasions, complement this jacket with a silk kurta set and mojaris for an elegant, traditional look.

products.name: Emerald Elegance Nehru Jacket
products.description: Crafted from plush velvet fabric in an intriguing Teal Green, this stylish Nehru Jacket is a must-have for any event. The rich color imparts an elegant sophistication while the excellent design ensures a flattering fit. Comes with complementary pocket pin, perfect to grace traditional and formal occasions with an impeccable look.
